credit_line: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
title: Torture. poster for the Matsuya Department Store
medium: Off-set lithograph on white wove paper
description: Three predominantly red sections on single poster. First section mostly red with white and orange highlight; second image mostly red with some blue and white, outline of a girl, bound, lying on the floor; third section predominantly red with white, blue, orange and green, two images of girl, bound, on the floor - one at the top of the section in red, blue and grey, the other at the bottom of the section in white highlights.
name: Poster
